akn:section.akn:heading: Authorization of appropriations for acquisition of additional lands

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 266. Authorization of appropriations for acquisition of additional lands For the acquisition of lands authorized in section 267 of this title, there are authorized to be appropriated such sums as may be necessary, but not more than $427,500. (Pub. L. 93–477, title I, § 101(3), Oct. 26, 1974, 88 Stat. 1445.)
Editorial Notes Codification Section was not enacted as part of act June 11, 1940, ch. 304, 54 Stat. 262, which comprises this subchapter.
